name: Toad in Fairy-Moon Kingdom (Demo 2)
description:
No controller support yet. Use arrow keys to move. Z to jump. X to do things.

Also you can run. You can run like in Kirby. Press the arrow key while moving and you'll run.

Also you can wall jump. You can probably figure it out.

If I'm not hanging out in AGDG then you can hit me up elsewhere... @dryadboy
